panels.description:
* success %: errors / success rate
* rps: requests per second
panels.title: Ingress traffic and success rate
Highest Timestamp In vs. Highest Timestamp Sent

targets.expr:
clamp_min(
  rate(prometheus_remote_storage_highest_timestamp_in_seconds{cluster_id=~"$cluster", instance=~"$instance"}[5m])  
- 
  ignoring (remote_name, url) group_right(instance) rate(prometheus_remote_storage_queue_highest_sent_timestamp_seconds{cluster_id=~"$cluster", instance=~"$instance", url=~"$url"}[5m])
, 0)

rate(
  prometheus_remote_storage_samples_in_total{cluster_id=~"$cluster", instance=~"$instance"}[5m])
- 
  ignoring(remote_name, url) group_right(instance) (rate(prometheus_remote_storage_succeeded_samples_total{cluster_id=~"$cluster", instance=~"$instance", url=~"$url"}[5m]) or rate(prometheus_remote_storage_samples_total{cluster_id=~"$cluster", instance=~"$instance", url=~"$url"}[5m]))
- 
  (rate(prometheus_remote_storage_dropped_samples_total{cluster_id=~"$cluster", instance=~"$instance", url=~"$url"}[5m]) or rate(prometheus_remote_storage_samples_dropped_total{cluster_id=~"$cluster", instance=~"$instance", url=~"$url"}[5m]))

panels.title: Rate, in vs. succeeded or dropped [5m]
